headline: 3 Reasons to Avoid ROK and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Rockwell Automation has had an impressive run over the past six months as its shares have beaten the S&P 500 by 10.6%. The stock now trades at $342.48, marking a 25.5% gain. This was partly due to its solid quarterly results, and the performance may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
